sn22.66:1.2: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu …pe… ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.66:1.3: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṅkhittena dhammaṁ desetu …pe… ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn22.66:1.4: “Yaṁ kho, bhikkhu, aniccaṁ; tatra te chando pahātabbo”ti.
sn22.66:2.1: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāsī”ti?
sn22.66:2.2: “Rūpaṁ kho, bhante, aniccaṁ; tatra me chando pahātabbo.
sn22.66:2.6: viññāṇaṁ aniccaṁ; tatra me chando pahātabbo.
sn22.66:2.7: Imassa khvāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṁ vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāmī”ti.
sn22.66:3.2: Sādhu kho tvaṁ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāsi.
sn22.66:3.3: Rūpaṁ kho, bhikkhu, aniccaṁ; tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn22.66:3.7: viññāṇaṁ aniccaṁ; tatra kho te chando pahātabbo.
sn22.66:3.8: Imassa kho, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṁ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti …pe…
sn22.66:3.9: aññataro ca pana so bhikkhu arahataṁ ahosīti.
